apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple with a heart on Apple devices showcases two figures, one with a medium skin tone and the other with a dark skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart. Apple's characteristic glossy 3D rendering gives the figures a smooth, rounded appearance and the heart a delightful, polished sheen.  The emoji radiates warmth and affection, symbolizing love, partnership, and strong bonds between individuals, beautifully expressed through Apple's inclusive and visually appealing emoji design.
